leadership.name: Akhil Vajjhala
leadership.biography: Akhil is a senior at Stern pursuing Finance & Joint Minor in Math & CS and has held positions at EY and Polygon.

leadership.name: Sean Balakhanei
leadership.biography: Sean is a senior at Tandon majoring in CS with minors in Math & Finance and has experience at Group One and Amazon.

leadership.biography: Uday is a junior majoring in Finance & Data Science with experience at BusinessNext.

leadership.name: Michael Wong
leadership.biography: Michael is a senior majoring in Economics with a minor in Business and has experience at CertiK, Near Horizon, and Soulmynt.

leadership.name: Varun Aravapalli
leadership.biography: Varun is a senior majoring in Tandon CS with experience at Barclays, Numina, and Computational Geometry Research at Tandon.

leadership.name: Vishakh Sandwar
leadership.biography: Vishakh is a sophomore majoring in Math & Finance with experience at Daloopa Summer, KlannLab, and GetPupil.

leadership.name: Gaby Aragundi
leadership.biography: Gaby is a senior majoring in Math & CS with experience in Tax @ RSM and Auto Movers Co.

leadership.name: Smit Bajaj
leadership.biography: Smit is a junior majoring in Sports Management & Data Science with experience at Paris Basketball, Seventy-Six Capital, and SportsTechX.

leadership.name: Shreyaas Sureshbabu
leadership.biography: Shreyaas is a junior majoring in Finance & CS with experience at Commvault, Arrosoft Solutions, and ML Research at Stern.

leadership.name: Krish Sharma
leadership.biography: Krish is a sophomore majoring in Finance & Data Science with experience at IAN VC, TIE Delhi, and Tinkerly.

leadership.name: Sandra Cai
